biotools.summary:
Single-cell Aggregated Clustering via Mixture Model Ensemble.

SAME (Single-cell RNA-seq Aggregated clustering via Mixture model Ensemble): Cluster ensemble for single-cell RNA-seq data.

SAMEclustering (Single-cell RNA-seq Aggregated clustering via Mixture model Ensemble): Cluster ensemble for single-cell RNA-seq data.

Although several methods have been recently developed to cluster single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-Seq) data, they utilize different characteristics of data and yield varying results in terms of both the number of clusters and actual cluster assignments

bioschemas.name: SAME-clustering
